issue.title: [Java][Dataset] Support writing to files within dataset scanner via JNI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11776](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11776). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should include following:

1. Add writing methods to Java Dataset API;
1. In FileSystemDataset (Java), add base support of writing Parquets via JNI. (See also ARROW-9646)
